/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.AgencyReqMapper.findApplypayment */ SELECT AR.CO_CODE , AR.AGENCY_SEQ , TA.AGENCY_NAME , AR.USER_ID , AR.AGENCY_ID , AR.PROD_ID , AR.REQ_DATE , AR.INCENTIVE_RATE , TAP.PROD_NAME , AR.INFLOW_CNT , AR.PROD_AMT , AR.SALE_TOTAL_AMT , AR.EXPECT_AMT , AR.APPLY_STATUS , C.CODE_NAME AS APPLY_STATUS_NAME FROM AGENCY_REQ AR LEFT JOIN TB_AGENCY TA ON TA.CO_CODE = AR.CO_CODE AND TA.AGENCY_ID = AR.AGENCY_ID LEFT JOIN TB_AG_PRODUCTS TAP ON TAP.CO_CODE = AR.CO_CODE AND TAP.PROD_ID = AR.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN CDBASE C ON C.CO_CODE = AR.CO_CODE AND C.PATTERN_CODE = 'SE04' AND C.BASE_CODE = AR.APPLY_STATUS WHERE AR.CO_CODE = #{loginCoId} AND AR.REQ_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{searchStartDate}, '-', ''), '%Y%m%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{searchEndDate}, '-', ''), '%Y%m%d')
AND TA.AGENCY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{agencyName}, '%')
